abstract: Octo Telematics of Italy, whose devices help auto insurers set rates, is preparing its United States offering at a difficult time for market debuts.
snippet: Octo Telematics of Italy, whose devices help auto insurers set rates, is preparing its United States offering at a difficult time for market debuts.
lead_paragraph: In a market that has scared off potential initial public offerings of stock, one company whose purpose is to manage risk is taking steps toward a market debut.

headline.main: Octo Telematics, Whose Technology Monitors Driving, Prepares I.P.O.
headline.print_headline: I.P.O. Is Planned for Provider to Car Insurers of Tech That Monitors Driving
